attributes.action: Ensure that all who post e-petitions are advised of the fate of their petition by email within 7 days.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I posted an e-petition a few months ago about an anti-retrospective law Bill but nothing was done. I followed it up and was promised that it would be posted - it wasn't. I followed it up again and no response at all.  I fear this is a stealth means of disposing of e-petitions that the Prime Minister doesn't want to be worried about!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
